item.description:
The silly season is upon us again and what better way to celebrate than the inaugural Aussie meetup Xmas party? The location will be Kings in Back Bay and with a combination of bars, billards and ten pin bowling there promises to be fun for everyone. And since you have all been so good this year we have arranged an extra special Xmas treat: a joint meetup with the Boston Canadian expat group. So come along, say G'day to your Aussie mates, meet some new friends of the Maple Leaf variety and enjoy a great night out.

We'll need firm numbers to make the appropriate bookings so please make sure to RSVP

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Aussie meetup Xmas party: beer, skittles and international relations
